items.value: Capone is waiting for his Share!

Did you sell the Stuff?
I need € 700 of the Income, you can keep € 300.
Thank goodness my Dealer is healthy again!!

Capone wants:
€ 700

You can keep:
€ 300
Uh.. your Money.. will be back!

Yes, it's about selling more Baggies.
Attend another Concert to get rid of them!
I will of course reward you for that.

Your Reputation with the Gang also increases!
sounds good, where did we stop?
Err.. i will come back later!

you are really a great Guy!
I look forward to doing more Business with you.

Where's the € 700, my Share?
Did you spend all the Money?!?!

Come back with the Money otherwise it will have consequences!
